divs: sighting detailstraveling northbound on i-75 just north of berea, ky and i saw what looked like a long red lighted cylinder with a short blue lighted "tail" headed eastbound. no sounds were heard from this; seemed about 3\4 mile ahead; we were traveling 70mph; never heard a landing, it seemed to be travelling at a high rate of speed, at least double what we were traveling. i live near an international airport and never saw anything like this. the red and blue lights looked like neon lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in KNOXVILLE
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I SAW AN OBJECT FLYING EASTWARD AND SLIGHTLY DOWNWARD AS IF GOING IN FOR A LANDING; VERY FAST; SILENT; HEARD NO SOUND AND NO LANDING SOUND. CYLINDRICAL LONG HORIZONTAL RED LIGHT FOLLOWED BY A SHORT BLUE LIGHT.
